name: Russian Taxi Simulator 3D
description:
Russian Taxi simulator 3D is the best taxi simulator that will offer you the chance to feel like a real Russian taxi driver. Smooth controls, realistic car physics and addictive gameplay await you! Try to become the best taxi driver in real Russian city!

Meet our player Russian Ivan who is new to the City and want to explore it, but has no cash. Tired of robbery and car theft, waiting for the police chase, Ivan took a job at the bus driver. Help Ivan to become the best driver of the coolest taxi in the Russian city!

Features:
- Realistic physics of taxi and other vehicles
- Unique applications for taxi and to deliver passengers from the entrance to the entrance!
- Excellent detailed realistic passengers / pedestrians with elaboration animations
- Intelligent Transport System Traffic - Russian car industry legends such as Lada and UAZ
- A realistic system of traffic lights and gas stations
- You can choose a variety of taxis, mines and buy - Taxi USSR GAZ-24, Lada 2112 and Lada Priora
- Real Russian city - a taste of the Motherland!
- Soft Control with the arrow keys or the accelerometer!
- Camera with salon and other kinds!
- Incredible 3D graphics, Explore the world!
- Addictive gameplay!

Want to feel like a taxi driver Russian? Then Russian Taxi simulator 3D is your choice!
